desc_en: The maximum number of simultaneous connections that mongod will accept. This setting has a hard limit of 1 million connections. If the limit is exceeded, mongod will refuse new connections.
desc_zh: mongod 将接受的最大同时连接数。此设置的硬限制为 100 万个连接。如果超过限制，mongod 将拒绝新连接。

desc_en: Specifies the default compression algorithm for collection data. Available compressors are: none (no compression), snappy (default, good balance), zlib (better compression), and zstd (best compression, MongoDB 4.2+).
desc_zh: 指定集合数据的默认压缩算法。可用的压缩器包括：none（无压缩）、snappy（默认，良好平衡）、zlib（更好的压缩）和 zstd（最佳压缩，MongoDB 4.2+）。

desc_en: Specifies the compression algorithm for journal data. Journal compression reduces disk I/O but increases CPU usage. Available options: none, snappy (default), zlib, zstd.
desc_zh: 指定日志数据的压缩算法。日志压缩可减少磁盘 I/O 但会增加 CPU 使用率。可用选项：none、snappy（默认）、zlib、zstd。

desc_en: Specifies the maximum size in megabytes for the replication operation log (oplog). MongoDB automatically sizes the oplog to 5% of available disk space, but you can configure this setting. Minimum is 990 MB for 64-bit systems.
desc_zh: 指定复制操作日志（oplog）的最大大小（MB）。MongoDB 会自动将 oplog 大小设置为可用磁盘空间的 5%，但您可以配置此设置。64 位系统的最小值为 990 MB。

desc_en: The threshold in milliseconds at which the database profiler considers a query slow. Operations that take longer than this threshold are logged to the diagnostic log at the INFO level. Default is 100ms.
desc_zh: 数据库分析器认为查询缓慢的阈值（毫秒）。执行时间超过此阈值的操作将以 INFO 级别记录到诊断日志中。默认值为 100 毫秒。

desc_en: The number of milliseconds that a session remains active after its most recent use before being timed out. Cursors attached to timed-out sessions are closed. Default is 600000ms (10 minutes).
desc_zh: 会话在最近一次使用后保持活动状态的毫秒数，超过此时间将超时。附加到超时会话的游标将被关闭。默认值为 600000 毫秒（10 分钟）。
